Package reactor.io.net

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetChannel<IN,OUT>
    NetChannel implementations handle interacting with the client.
    NetChannel.ConsumerSpec
    Spec class for assigning multiple event handlers on a channel.
    NetClient<IN,OUT>
    A network-aware client.
    NetServer<IN,OUT>
    A network-aware server.
    Reconnect
    Implementations of this interface will be instantiated by a Supplier to provide information to the TcpClient whether or not to attempt to reconnect a broken connection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNetChannel<IN,OUT>
    An abstract NetChannel implementation that handles the basic interaction and Stream and Consumer handling.
    AbstractNetPeer<IN,OUT>
    Abstract base class that implements common functionality shared by clients and servers.
